entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: SW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near midnight then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers or drizzle and ending near noon then clearing. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2 except minus 6 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2 except minus 6 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
